## NiUriString type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type NiUriString<Alg extends NiAlgorithm = NiAlgorithm> = `ni://${NiAuthority}/${NiAlgorithm};${NiHashB64Url}${'' | `?ct=${NiMediaType}`}`;
```
